title: Deadly strikes in Gaza as Israel expands offensive to seize 'large areas'
snippets: At least 19 people are reported killed in Jabalia as Israel's defence minister says it is expanding ground operations.
summary: At least 19 individuals were reported dead in Jabalia. Concurrently, Israel's defense minister announced an expansion of ground military operations.
titles: Deadly strikes in Gaza as Israel expands offensive to seize 'large areas'

title: Inside Mandalay: BBC joins rescuers searching for earthquake dead in Myanmar
snippets: The BBC’s Yogita Limaye is the first foreign journalist to enter the country since the disaster struck.
summary: BBC journalist Yogita Limaye became the first foreign reporter to enter a country following a recent disaster, marking a significant moment in the coverage of the event.
titles: Inside Mandalay: BBC joins rescuers searching for earthquake dead in Myanmar

title: Massive swells smash windows at Sydney's Bondi Beach
snippets: A powerful king tide smashed glass, cracked footpaths and caused residents to evacuate as it battered Sydney's coast line.
summary: A powerful king tide hit Sydney's coastline, resulting in smashed glass, cracked footpaths, and the evacuation of residents due to the damage.
titles: Massive swells smash windows at Sydney's Bondi Beach

title: Israel’s war on Gaza deadliest conflict ever for journalists, says report
snippets: More journalists killed in Gaza than in both world wars, Vietnam, Yugoslavia and Afghanistan combined, report finds.
summary: A report has found that the number of journalists killed in Gaza surpasses the total fatalities among journalists in both World Wars, the Vietnam War, the conflicts in Yugoslavia, and Afghanistan combined.
titles: Israel’s war on Gaza deadliest conflict ever for journalists, says report

title: Video: Moment US Senator ends record-breaking speech targeting Trump
snippets: Democrat Cory Booker ended his record-breaking speech after holding the US Senate floor for more than 25 hours.
summary: Democrat Cory Booker concluded his speech on the US Senate floor after speaking for over 25 hours, setting a record for the longest speech in the chamber's history.
titles: Video: Moment US Senator ends record-breaking speech targeting Trump

title: Arteta 'worried' by Arsenal's fresh injury crisis
snippets: Arsenal face a potential injury crisis in defense ahead of their Champions League showdown with Real Madrid after Gabriel Magalhães and Jurriën Timber picked up injuries in Tuesday's Premier League win over Fulham.
summary: Arsenal could face a defensive challenge in their upcoming Champions League match against Real Madrid due to injuries sustained by Gabriel Magalhães and Jurriën Timber during their Premier League victory over Fulham on Tuesday.
titles: Arteta 'worried' by Arsenal's fresh injury crisis

title: Agent's Take: Breaking down Micah Parsons' contract complications, how Cowboys star should proceed in talks

summary: Contract negotiations between Dallas and Chandler Parsons are becoming increasingly complex and unclear, as both parties struggle to reach an agreement.
titles: Agent's Take: Breaking down Micah Parsons' contract complications, how Cowboys star should proceed in talks

title: MLB Rank 2025: Ranking baseball's top 100 players
snippets: From top sluggers like Ohtani and Judge to star pitchers like Skenes, we rank -- and make predictions for -- the best players in baseball right now.
summary: Rankings and predictions for top current baseball players, including sluggers like Ohtani and Judge, alongside star pitchers such as Skenes, have been released, showcasing the sport's leading talents.
titles: MLB Rank 2025: Ranking baseball's top 100 players

title: Sources: Former NBA star Anthony elected to HOF
snippets: Former NBA Star Carmelo Anthony has been notified that he's been elected into the Naismith Basketball Hall of Fame Class of 2025, sources tell ESPN's Shams Charania.
summary: Former NBA star Carmelo Anthony will be inducted into the Naismith Basketball Hall of Fame Class of 2025, according to sources reported by ESPN's Shams Charania.
titles: Sources: Former NBA star Anthony elected to HOF

title: A-Rod, Lore to own Timberwolves after standoff
snippets: Glen Taylor has agreed to the Marc Lore-Alex Rodriguez group acquiring 100% ownership of the Minnesota Timberwolves and Minnesota Lynx at the same $1.5 billion price the sides agreed on in 2021, sources told ESPN.
summary: Glen Taylor has agreed to sell 100% ownership of the Minnesota Timberwolves and Minnesota Lynx to the Marc Lore-Alex Rodriguez group for the previously agreed price of $1.5 billion, according to sources reported by ESPN.
titles: A-Rod, Lore to own Timberwolves after standoff

title: Tesla suffers worst quarter since 2022 as deliveries tumble
snippets: Shares rise on report Elon Musk to leave Trump administration
summary: A company has been overtaken by China's BYD as the world's top seller of electric vehicles.
titles: Tesla suffers worst quarter since 2022 as deliveries tumble

title: Musk’s role in Trump administration under pressure after Wisconsin loss
snippets: US president told confidants the billionaire’s role at Doge could end sooner than expected
summary: The US President has reportedly told close associates that the billionaire's tenure at Doge might conclude earlier than anticipated.
titles: Musk’s role in Trump administration under pressure after Wisconsin loss

title: Britain’s fiscal framework is not fit for purpose
snippets: There is nothing accountable or legitimate about unelected officials setting taxation and spending policy
summary: The statement criticizes the practice of unelected officials determining taxation and spending policies, questioning the accountability and legitimacy of such actions.
titles: Britain’s fiscal framework is not fit for purpose

title: After the euphoria, Lebanon and Syria realise what lies ahead
snippets: In both countries, the mood is newly sober as a system of vested interests fights back
summary: In both nations, there's a growing sense of seriousness as a network of entrenched interests begins to resist change.
titles: After the euphoria, Lebanon and Syria realise what lies ahead

title: Investors brace for sweeping Trump tariff announcement
snippets: Trading on Wall Street volatile as US president prepares to escalate trade war on ‘liberation day’
summary: Wall Street experienced volatility as the US president announced plans to intensify the trade war on what is referred to as 'liberation day.'
titles: Investors brace for sweeping Trump tariff announcement

title: Metamaterials: Highly twisted rods store large amounts of energy
snippets: An international research team has developed mechanical metamaterials with a high elastic energy density. Highly twisted rods that deform helically provide these metamaterials with a high stiffness and enable them to absorb and release large amounts of elastic energy. The researchers conducted simple compression experiments to confirm the initial theoretical results.
summary: An international team of researchers has created mechanical metamaterials capable of absorbing and releasing large amounts of elastic energy, thanks to their design of highly twisted rods that deform in a helical pattern. This design grants the materials high stiffness. The team's findings, initially theoretical, were confirmed through simple compression experiments.
titles: Metamaterials: Highly twisted rods store large amounts of energy

title: First ancient genomes from the Green Sahara deciphered
snippets: An international team has sequenced the first ancient genomes from the so-called Green Sahara, a period when the largest desert in the world temporarily turned into a humid savanna-like environment. By analyzing the DNA of two 7,000-year-old naturally mummified individuals excavated in the Takarkori rock shelter in southwestern Libya, the team showed that they belonged to a long-isolated and now extinct North African human lineage.
summary: An international team sequenced ancient genomes from two 7,000-year-old mummies found in Libya, revealing they belonged to an extinct North African lineage. This research offers insights into the Green Sahara period, when the Sahara Desert was a humid savanna-like environment.
titles: First ancient genomes from the Green Sahara deciphered

title: Mammals were adapting from life in the trees to living on the ground before dinosaur-killing asteroid
snippets: More mammals were living on the ground several million years before the mass extinction event that wiped out the dinosaurs, new research has revealed.
summary: Recent research has discovered that several million years before the mass extinction event that eradicated the dinosaurs, a larger number of mammals were already inhabiting terrestrial environments.
titles: Mammals were adapting from life in the trees to living on the ground before dinosaur-killing asteroid

title: Rocky Mountain snow is contaminated, study shows
snippets: Mountain snowpacks accumulate snow throughout the winter, building up stores of water that will supply communities across the American West throughout the long dry season. Now, a new study shows that as storms carry snow to the Rocky Mountains, they are also bringing mercury and other contaminants from mines in the region. The research helps scientists understand how contaminants are spread by atmospheric circulation and has implications for snowpack preservation and illuminating the lasting environmental impact of mining activities.
summary: A new study reveals that storms transporting snow to the Rocky Mountains are also carrying mercury and other contaminants from regional mines. This research highlights how atmospheric circulation spreads pollutants and underscores the environmental consequences of mining. It also sheds light on the importance of preserving snowpacks, which serve as vital water sources for communities across the American West during dry seasons.
titles: Rocky Mountain snow is contaminated, study shows

title: New insight into factors associated with a common disease among dogs and humans
snippets: For dogs housed at Texas kennels, age and fecal score are important factors for screening for subclinical Giardia infections.
summary: Research on dogs in Texas kennels indicates that age and fecal score are significant indicators for identifying subclinical Giardia infections, suggesting these factors should be prioritized in screenings.
titles: New insight into factors associated with a common disease among dogs and humans
